citations.narrative:
In the enclosure housing three beagles, the cement block painted wall had an irregular surface, with paint missing and
exposing the cement block. Walls of housing facilities for dogs must be impervious to moisture, in order to facilitate the
required cleaning and sanitization required.
Corrected during inspection on 29 April 2024 by moving the dogs into a compliant enclosure.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.2(d) 
   
Indoor housing facilities. 
In the enclosure housing three beagles, the cement block painted wall had an irregular surface, with paint missing and 
exposing the cement block. Walls of housing facilities for dogs must be impervious to moisture, in order to facilitate the 
required cleaning and sanitization required. 
 
Corrected during inspection on 29 April 2024 by moving the dogs into a compliant enclosure. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
